content.text: what do you do for fun?
I like to eat sushi and go to the archery center, how about you?
I love doing wine tours and rollerblading! I also like to watch the food network and HGTV.
My favorite colors are red, blue, and green!
Those are all really nice colors! Do you have any siblings?
Yeah, I have two siblings, both younger than me.
That must be fun! I'm an only child.
It is sometimes, but it can be annoying too.
I can imagine! Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet, I might go rollerblading or go to the movies.
That sounds like fun! I'm going to the archery center with my friends.
That sounds really fun! Have a good time!
